mapper.sql: ADMIN_USER_ID, ADMIN_USER_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICK_NAME, MOBILE_PHONE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, CREATE_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_IP

ADMIN_USER_ID AS adminUserID, ADMIN_USER_NAME AS adminUserName, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, NICK_NAME AS nickName, MOBILE_PHONE AS mobilePhone, TELEPHONE AS telephone, EMAIL AS email, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastLoginTime, LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp
mapper.select:
SELECT ADMIN_USER_ID AS adminUserID, ADMIN_USER_NAME AS adminUserName, NAME AS name, NICK_NAME AS nickName, MOBILE_PHONE AS mobilePhone, TELEPHONE AS telephone, EMAIL AS email, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastLoginTime, LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp FROM T_ADMIN_USER WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADMIN_USER_ID=#{adminUserName}

update t_admin_user
ADMIN_USER_NAME = #{adminUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ADMIN_USER_ID = #{adminUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
